title: Ep. 140 - Where Should Investors Put Their Money?
itunes:title: Where Should Investors Put Their Money?
description: Frank Curzio takes a quick break from investing to discuss the Penn State scandal, and then he welcomes CNBC Fast Money personality Jared Levy, who also serves as Managing Partner at Belpointe Capital and Senior Equities Strategist at Zacks Investment Research. Levy teaches the basics of options trading and gives his outlook on Europe and the equity markets.
